summary: Rebuilts the Western Watchtower (For beste Performance activate after Dragon Attack !)
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][size=2] [center][size=5][b][i][color=#ff0000]I do not work on this anymore. Altough I decided to revamp the Mod for SSE.
[/color][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9786/?][color=#ff7700][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9786/?[/u][/color][/url][color=#ff7700][/color][/size][/i][/b][size=5][u][/u][/size][b][i][u]

Whiterun Wester Watchtower - Never Destroyed[/u][/i][/b][/size][/center][i][u][b]

For Best Performance Activate AFTER Dragon attack but Shouldn't Break any Quests, so you can use it while/with Dragon Attack ![/b]
[b]
[size=3](Features)[/size]
[/b][/u][b]-Guards at the Maingate
-Small Honningbrew Tavern in a Tent
-Tents with Campfire
-Enchantment Table, Archery Table, Workbench
-Merchant for Weapons at Smith
-Targets,Dummies
-Bed
-Guards on Top and Fire
-Fully Repaired
-2 Wood Towers with Soliders[u]

[size=3](Installation)[/size]
[/u]Extract Western Watchtower Rebuilt.esp into your data folder[u]

[size=3](Un-installation)[/size]
[/u]Delete .esp from your data folder[u]

[size=3](Bugs/Incompatibilities)[/size]
[/u]In Distance it shows the "Old" Or better said: Destroyed Watchtower
Doesnt Works with other Western Watchtower Rebuilt mods !
On the Wood-Towers Navmesh doesnt works !
[u]
[size=3]Video by Nozi89[/size]
[/u][/b][/i][/size][/size][size=5][size=2][u]
[b][i][youtube]9VfspfNmZeA[/youtube][/i][/b][/u][/size][/size]
author: Alexxonder
